name: Alone at Midnight
description:
Game made by Sean173

NOTE: This game is made for Windows, it may work with Mac and Linux but you might encounter bugs.

A short 5 minute creepy game about a 12 year-old boy who is alone at midnight and is waiting for his parents to arrive home, he was sleeping until he woke up unexpectedly. He gets out of his bed to see if his parents are home but then he finds something weird.

Controls:

ESCQuit the GameWWalk forwardAWalk to the LeftSWalk backwardsDWalk to the rightShift WWalk fasterEInteract with doors

Music:

Out From The Wasteland

Zombie Hoodoo - Kevin Macleod

Colorless Aura - Kevin Macleod
